pages.text: An ancient wizard more concerned with the question of if he could not if he should created the Arcane Applicator. The device can store a Runic Stone of Storage, a Scroll of Save Starbuncle, a Scroll of Spell Transfer or an inscribed Spell Parchment and apply it to surrounding machinery when it receives a redstone signal.

It applies the stored configurations to all Spellturrets (for Scrolls) and relays (for Runic Stones) right next to it. The Scroll of Save Starbuncle will be applied to all Starbuncles in a 10 block radius that are bound to a bed right next to the Arcane Applicator
